long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find X (Twitter) users emails and reach out to them via email to avoid spamming in DM.

Pistachio allows you to validate idea or find customers on X (Twitter) by finding out and verifying emails for you. Pistachio also helps you to draft out personalized emails so you have a better open and reply rates.
